  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match(List<Team> teams, List<Player> playerOrder, boolean expert)
      Match Constructor creates a new Match object with the following parameters
      Parameters:
      teams - as a group of players (black, white, or grey)
      playerOrder - input turn order of players
      expert - boolean to decide if expert mode is on for the match

      public Team getTeamFromColor(TowerColor color) throws IllegalMoveException
      Searches for a team with a certain tower color
      Parameters:
      color - TowerColor of a team
      Returns:
      The team with the given tower color
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When there isn't a team with the given tower color

      Parameters:
      player - Player
      Returns:
      The team which the given player is part of
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When the given player isn't part of any teams

    • extractStudents

      public List<Student> extractStudents(int n)
      Extracts n random students from studentBag, removing them from it
      Parameters:
      n - Number of students that is required to extract from studentBag
      Returns:
      List of n random students from studentBag, or all the students in studentBag if studentBag.size() is less than n

    • removeProfessor

      public Professor removeProfessor(PawnColor color) throws IllegalMoveException
      Removes the professor of the given color on the board and returns it
      Parameters:
      color - PawnColor of the professor
      Returns:
      The professor of the given color
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When the professor of the given color is already taken by a player

    • whoHasProfessor

      public Player whoHasProfessor(PawnColor color)
      Searches for the player with the professor of the given color
      Parameters:
      color - PawnColor of the professor
      Returns:
      The player with the professor of the given color, or null if there isn't a player with the professor of the given color

    • playerMoveStudents

      public void playerMoveStudents(String playerName, PawnColor color, int n) throws IllegalMoveException
      Moves n students of the given color from the entrance to the player tables
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      color - PawnColor of the students
      n - Number of students of the given color
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When n is negative

    • checkNumberStudents

      public void checkNumberStudents(String playerName, PawnColor color) throws IllegalMoveException
      Checks the table count of the given color and if is 3, 6, or 9 adds a coin to the player coin reserve
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      color - PawnColor of the table
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When there aren't any players with the given name

    • checkProfessors

      public void checkProfessors(String playerName, PawnColor color) throws IllegalMoveException
      Checks the table count of the given color of all the players and gives the professor to the player with the most students in the table of that color. In case of a draw the professor remains to the original player
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      color - PawnColor of the professor
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When there aren't any players with the given name

    • islandInfluence

      public void islandInfluence(int index, boolean noMotherNatureMoves) throws IllegalMoveException
      Checks the influence of all the players of a certain island and manages the towers on that island
      Parameters:
      index - Index of an island
      noMotherNatureMoves - True if mother nature won't move, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - If the player with the most influence of the island isn't part of any team

    • checkIslands

      public void checkIslands(int index, boolean noMotherNatureMoves)
      Checks the 2 adjacent islands of an island and unifies them if they have the same tower color
      Parameters:
      index - Index of an island
      noMotherNatureMoves - True if mother nature won't move, false otherwise

    • islandIndex

      public int islandIndex(int idx)
      Formats an index of an island in module islands.size()
      Parameters:
      idx - Index of an island
      Returns:
      The index of the island in module islands.size()

    • uniteIslands

      public void uniteIslands(int min, int max, boolean noMotherNatureMoves)
      Unifies 2 islands with indexes min and max
      Parameters:
      min - Min between the 2 indexes
      max - Max between the 2 indexes
      noMotherNatureMoves - True if mother nature won't move, false otherwise

    • populateClouds

      public void populateClouds()
      Adds 3 students to all the clouds (for a 2 or 4 players match)

    • moveStudentsFromCloud

      public void moveStudentsFromCloud(String playerName, int cloudIndex) throws IllegalMoveException
      Moves all the students of a certain cloud to the player entrance
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      cloudIndex - Index of the selected cloud
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When a cloud has been already chosen by another player this turn. When the given cloud index is less than 0 or more than the clouds number

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(String playerName, int moves) throws IllegalMoveException
      Moves mother nature by a certain amount of moves
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      moves - Moves that the player wants to make with mother nature
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When the given moves are less than 1 or more than the value of the assistant played by the player

    • isExpert

      public boolean isExpert()
      isExpert()
      Returns:
      True if the match is expert, false otherwise

      public int getCoins()
      getCoins()
      Returns:
      The number of coins available on the board

      public void setDrawAllowed(boolean drawAllowed)
      setDrawAllowed()
      Parameters:
      drawAllowed - True if the Character2 ability is been played this turn, false otherwise

    • getDrawAllowed

      public boolean getDrawAllowed()
      getDrawAllowed()
      Returns:
      True if the Character2 ability is been played this turn, false otherwise

      getInfluencePolicy()
      Returns:
      The policies for counting influence

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The number of towers with the given color that are on all islands

    • getWinningTeam

      public Team getWinningTeam()
      Gets the winning team
      Returns:
      The winning team, or null in case of a draw

    • isGameFinished

      public boolean isGameFinished()
      isGameFinished()
      Returns:
      True if the game is finished, false otherwise

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      isLastTurn()
      Returns:
      True if it's the last turn of the game, false otherwise

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayer)
      Sets the current player in the turn
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - Name of the player that will become the current player

    • useAssistant

      public void useAssistant(String playerName, int value) throws IllegalMoveException
      Allows a player to use an assistant if available. Sets turn order of players via assistants played.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      value - Value of the assistant that the player wants to use
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When the given assistant value is less than 1 or more than 10. When the player with the given name doesn't have an assistant with the given value. When an assistant with the given value has already been played this turn and the player with the given name has other options

    • moveStudentsToIslandsAndTable

      public void moveStudentsToIslandsAndTable(String playerName, Map<Integer,Map<PawnColor,Integer>> islandsStudents, Map<PawnColor,Integer> tableStudents) throws IllegalMoveException
      Moves 3 students from a player entrance to an island and/or to his tables
      Parameters:
      playerName - The username of a player
      islandsStudents - Students that the player wants to move from his entrance to an island
      tableStudents - Students that the player wants to move from his entrance to his tables
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - When the player wants to move a different amount of students than 3. When an island index doesn't exist

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates the status of the match, and push updated match data to the View
